original_text: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
korean_text: 그러나 이는 그들의 율법에 기록된 바 그들이 이유 없이 나를 미워하였다 한 말을 응하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: that the word might be fulfilled
that is written in their law
They hated me without a cause
